content: I have created a stream to focus on Security and Privacy. This would be for discussions about the Security and Privacy mechanisms within FHIR, and those that are used to support FHIR. Model development and improvement, as well as implementation. Welcome to #Security and Privacy.
Upgrading zulip to 1.8 (http://blog.zulip.org/2018/04/18/zulip-1-8-released/) -- should be back shortly.
